results.name: China Star
results.notes: A cornerstone in the Niles community, offering modern interpretations of classic Chinese dishes with high-quality, fresh ingredients.

results.name: Bowl of Fortune Express
results.notes: Offers a whirlwind of flavors where Chinese favorites meet swift delivery and takeaway, delighting in vibrant dishes.

sources.title: Order Authentic Chinese Online | Bowl of Fortune Express

results.name: Panda Express
results.notes: A popular fast-casual chain known for American-Chinese cuisine, offering dishes like Orange Chicken and Beijing Beef.

sources.title: Panda Express at Milwaukee & Maryland (Golf Mill Relocation) PX

results.name: Twin Dragon Restaurant
results.notes: Offers Korean-style Chinese cuisine with delicious and large portions, known for fast service.

results.name: 168 Chinese Restaurant
results.notes: A local Chinese restaurant in Niles, Illinois.
